instructions: From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu button. Tap Settings . Tap Spam message . Tap Block spam to enable. Tap Spam words . Tap on the ' + ' sign to add specific key words to the spam list.
Tap Spam words . Tap on the ' + ' sign to add specific key words to the spam list.
From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu > Spam manager . Tap Spam settings > Spam numbers . Tap '+' to add a number. Enter the number you want to block. Tap Save .
From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu > Spam manager . Tap Spam settings > Spam words . Tap '+' to add a word. Enter the word you want to block. Tap Save .

From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu button. Tap Settings . Tap Spam message . Tap Block spam to disable. Tap Spam words . Tap on the Trash can icon to remove specific key words to the spam list.
Tap Spam words . Tap on the Trash can icon to remove specific key words to the spam list.
From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu > Spam manager . Tap Spam settings > Spam numbers . Tap the Trash can . Select the desired number(s) or tap Select all. Tap Delete > Yes .
From the Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu > Spam manager . Tap Spam settings > Spam words . Tap the Trash can . Select the desired number(s) or tap Select all. Tap Delete > Yes .
From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Select the message thread. Touch and hold the picture message. Tap Delete . Tap Yes .
From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Select the message thread. Touch and hold the text message. Tap Delete . Tap Yes .

From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Select the message thread that contains the picture message. Touch and hold the picture. Tap Save attachment . If necessary, select the location to save to. Tap OK .
From any Home screen, tap Messaging . Tap the Menu key Tap Settings . Tap Text message . View the Service center address .
